description: Replaces a specified line in a file with new content. The line to be replaced is identified by its line number and hash, which can be obtained using the 'file read lines' endpoint. This operation is irreversible, so use with caution.

args.name: workingDirectory
args.description: The absolute path to the directory where the file is located.

args.name: filePath
args.description: The relative path of the file in which a line will be replaced.

args.name: lineNumber
args.description: The line number of the line to be replaced. DO NOT GUESS OR ASSUME. This must be obtained from the 'file read lines' endpoint to ensure accuracy.

args.name: lineHash
args.description: The hash of the line to be replaced for verification. DO NOT GUESS OR ASSUME. This must be obtained from the 'file read lines' endpoint.

args.name: newContent
args.description: The new content to replace the old content with.
